sentences.en: A description of plasma instabilities in a systematic way is nontrivial.
sentences.cn: 用系统的方法讲述等离子体不稳定性并不是容易的.

sentences.en: a systematic approach to solving the problem
sentences.cn: 系统解决问题的办法

sentences.en: a systematic way of organizing your work
sentences.cn: 井然有序的工作安排方式

sentences.en: Clastic facies pattern recognition is somewhat systematic.
sentences.cn: 碎屑岩相模式的识别是带有一定系统性的.

sentences.en: Direct regulation, by contrast, is systematic.
sentences.cn: 相比较而言, 直接管制是系统的.

sentences.en: Experienced observers concentrate on systematic investigations.
sentences.cn: 有经验的观测者致力于系统的研究.

sentences.en: He is a systematic researcher.
sentences.cn: 他是个按部就班的研究者.

sentences.en: He is systematic in his approach to work.
sentences.cn: 他工作起来井井有条.

sentences.en: He made a systematic study of the problem.
sentences.cn: 他对这个问题作了彻底的研究.

sentences.en: I prefer the first one because this kind of learning is systematic and formal.
sentences.cn: 我更喜欢第一个，因为这种学习是系统的和正式的。

sentences.en: It involves systematic yet banal design, and blunt reportage.
sentences.cn: 它使用系统的,然而平庸的设计和迟钝的新闻报道.

sentences.en: It is in the former case where a systematic method is important.
sentences.cn: 在前一种情况中有规则的方法是非常重要的.

sentences.en: It is possible to devise corresponding systematic procedures for rigid jointed frames.
sentences.cn: 推导出适合于钢架的类似步骤也是可能的.

sentences.en: Meteorological errors are clearly unlikely to be systematic to any great extent.
sentences.cn: 气象误差显然不大可能在大范围内是系统性的.

sentences.en: The systematic name encodes the structure and composition of the caffeine molecule in some detail, and provides an unambiguous reference to this compound, whereas the name "caffeine" just names it.
sentences.cn: 系统名称在一些细节上包含了咖啡因分子结构和组成，并提供了一个明确的参照，而这种化合物名为“咖啡因”只是它的名字。

sentences.en: The way he works isn't very systematic.
sentences.cn: 他的工作不是很有条理.

sentences.en: There is no substitute for confronting a case, building your own systematic way to analyze it, then improving your model through discussions with others.
sentences.cn: 面对案例，建立你自己的系统的方式分析它、然后通过与别人讨论改善你的模型，这一过程无法代替。

sentences.en: They went about their business in a systematic way.
sentences.cn: 他们按部就班地做生意。

sentences.en: This problem cries out for a long - term , open - minded, systematic search.
sentences.cn: 这个问题十分需要 长期 的 、 不带偏见的 、 系统的探索研究.

sentences.en: We need a systematic training program. First, we should do some flexibility exercises, and then I will customize a training program for you.
sentences.cn: 我们需要一个系统的训练计划.先要做些适应性训练.然后我会为你量身制定一份训练计划.

sentences.en: What about all other systematic knowledge?
sentences.cn: 对于所有其他系统的知识呢？
